slug: # slug          (required) Unique machine-readable ID. Use kebab-case. e.g. tww-rtwf-s1
# patch_version (optional) e.g. 11.0.5 — leave empty if unknown
# end_date      (optional) YYYY-MM-DD — leave empty for open-ended or single-day events
#               IMPORTANT: fill this in for backtest bias guard (is_known_at)
# recurrence_rule (optional) iCal RRULE string for recurring events
# Example rows — delete or replace before importing:

notes: TWW expansion day; historic demand spike for all consumables and crafting mats.
Pre-patch brings class changes; flask/gem demand shifts.
Race to World First; extreme consumable demand spike for ~2 weeks.
Season 1 launches; crafted gear / enchant / gem surge.
Annual holiday; limited demand for seasonal items.
